sourcesContent:
New Company

Back
Company Name is required
code is required
Share Price is required
Share Price is invalid
Created Date is required
import { Component, OnInit, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-company', templateUrl: './add-company.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-company.component.scss'] }) export class AddCompanyComponent implements OnInit { addCompanyForm: companyForm = new companyForm(); @ViewChild("companyform") companyform!: NgForm isSubmitted: boolean = false; constructor(private router: Router) { } ngOnInit(): void { } AddCompany(isValid: any) { this.isSubmitted = true; if (isValid) { } } } export class companyForm { companyName: string = ""; code: string = ""; sharePrice: number | undefined ; createdDate: Date | undefined ; }
